content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München, Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The landlord and I could not agree on a final price because we had differing views on the fair market price of the apartment. The landlord was seeking a price closer to 1200 euros, while I, as a potential tenant, was willing to pay 1000 euros, given the unfurnished state of the apartment and the lack of appliances.
name: Haoyu Wang

content:
On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, 
how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as a 7.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang
